meta.description: Maximize profit from investing in condos and detached houses with budget and investment constraints.

sets.name: INVESTMENT_OPTIONS
sets.description: Types of real estate investment options available.

params.name: profit_per_dollar
params.description: Profit per dollar invested in each option.

params.name: min_condos_percentage
params.description: Minimum percentage of total investment that must be in condos.

params.name: min_detached_houses_investment
params.description: Minimum investment required in detached houses.

vars.name: investment
vars.description: Amount of money invested in each option.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total investment must not exceed the available budget.

constraints.name: min_condos_investment
constraints.description: At least 20% of total investment must be in condos.

constraints.name: min_detached_houses_investment
constraints.description: At least $20000 must be invested in detached houses.
